title: Inexplicably low fps?
body: For the last three consecutive games, I've had really low fps (sitting consistently around 20-30). I've checked my computer's tasks and performance, and it's not using more than 4% processing power outside of League. I don't have any games, videos, or music playing in the background, in fact no active windows at all. I usually have some lag while playing, as the wifi in my flat is a little unreliable, but this fps problem is new. Is anybody else experiencing it, or should I go talk to the IT crowd?

replies.body:
>  or should I go talk to the IT crowd?

have you tried turning it off and on again( lel srry couldnt help myself)

If you're having FPS issues, please try the solutions in the Low Framerate (FPS) Troubleshooting article linked below. Let me know if anything works!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting

Repairing the files seems to have worked (i also blew into the fan while I was waiting since I don't have access to 'compressed air'!). If the problem persists, I'll try playing around with the visual and audio settings in game. Thank you so much!
Ah, my pleasure, friend! Have fun :)
